label: 本領
本: State of War: the Violent Order of Fourteenth Century Japan . Michigan University Press . 2003
説明文: Homelands. Generic term used to describe lands that were a occupied by warriors and perceived as being their innate possession. Most claims were based the fact that the owner," who often possessed the same surname as the lands in question, had either personally cleared or reclaimed the land, or was directly descended from one who had done so."
